scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../mobile && npm install && cd ../ai-services && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:mobile
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:e2e
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && kubectl apply -f infrastructure/k8s/dev/
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && kubectl apply -f infrastructure/k8s/prod/
